key_features: Earn 2.8 air miles (7X TREATS Points) for every S$1 spent on air tickets and foreign currency transactions when you charge a min. of S$800 per calendar month
Earn 1.2 air miles (3X TREATS Points) for every S$1 spent on all local shopping, groceries, dining, hotel bookings and many more
Complimentary lounge access with minimum spend of S$1,000 in a single transaction on a retail purchase, accompanying guest(s) enjoys 20% off walk-in rates for lounge access.
Complimentary Travel Insurance up to S$1,000,000
3 years annual fee waived; spend min. S$18,000 per year to get subsequent waiver
air_miles: Earn 2.8 air miles (7X TREATS Points) for every S$1 spent on air tickets and foreign currency transactions when you charge a min. of S$800 per calendar month
Earn 1.2 air miles (3X TREATS Points) for every S$1 spent on all local shopping, groceries, dining, hotel bookings and many more
No cap for TREATS Points earned for foreign spend
Capped at 40,000 Bonus TREATS Points per calendar month for air tickets only
Earn 0.4 air miles (1X TREAT Point) with no minimum spend amount
Complimentary lounge access with minimum spend of S$1,000
Complimentary Travel Insurance up to S$1,000,000
overseas_spending: Earn 2.8 air miles (7X TREATS Points) for every S$1 spent on air tickets and foreign currency transactions when you charge a min. of S$800 per calendar month
If the monthly accumulated spend is less than S$800, 1.2 air miles (3X TREATS Points) will be awarded for air tickets and foreign spend
No cap for TREATS Points earn on foreign spend
Earn 0.4 air miles (1X TREAT Point) with no minimum spend amount
petrol: Earn 1.2 air miles (3X TREATS Points) for every S$1 spent
No minimum spend required to spend 3X TREATS Points
rewards: Earn 2.8 air miles (7X TREATS Points) for every S$1 spent on air tickets and foreign currency transactions when you charge a min. of S$800 per calendar month
Earn 1.2 air miles (3X TREATS Points) for every S$1 spent on all local shopping, groceries, dining, hotel bookings and many more
No cap for TREATS Points earned for foreign spend
Capped at 40,000 Bonus TREATS Points per calendar month for air tickets only
1X TREAT Point with no minimum spend amount
Complimentary lounge access with minimum spend of S$1,000
Complimentary Travel Insurance up to S$1,000,000
dining: Earn 1.2 air miles (3X TREATS Points) for every S$1 spent on all local shopping, groceries, dining, hotel bookings and many more
No minimum spend required to spend 3X TREATS Points
online_shopping: Earn 1.2 air miles (3X TREATS Points) for every S$1 spent on all local shopping, groceries, dining, hotel bookings and many more
No minimum spend required to spend 3X TREATS Points

fees.annual_fee_waiver: Available with a total yearly minimum spend of S$18,000
fees.annual_interest_rate: 27.90% p.a. subject to a minimum charge of S$3.00
fees.late_payment_fee: 5% of the minimum monthly repayment or S$100, whichever is higher, if minimum monthly repayment is not received by due date
fees.minimum_monthly_repayment: 3% of outstanding balance or S$20, whichever is higher
fees.foreign_transaction_fee: All transactions in foreign currency will be subject to an administrative fee of 2.25% and a currency conversion charge of 1% imposed by the respective card associations
fees.cash_advance_fee: 8% of the transaction amount or S$15, whichever is higher

minimum_income.non_singaporean: Non-Singaporean Minimum Income S$60000. Malaysia Citizens (in employment for at least 1 year): S$45,000
